_comment: Camera configuration for FootballVision Pro - See src/video-pipeline/README.md for details
_quality_comment: Recording quality preset: 'high' (25Mbps, superfast, bframes=1), 'balanced' (22Mbps, superfast, bframes=1), or 'fast' (20Mbps, ultrafast, bframes=0). Default: fast
_recording_require_all_cameras_comment: If true, recording start fails unless both cameras start successfully; prevents one-sided captures.
_recording_recovery_max_attempts_comment: Number of automatic per-camera restart attempts after asynchronous pipeline errors before marking recording degraded.
_recording_recovery_backoff_seconds_comm: Base seconds for linear backoff between camera recovery attempts.
_recording_stop_eos_timeout_seconds_comm: Seconds to wait for EOS when stopping recording before forcing NULL state.
_recording_integrity_probe_timeout_secon: Timeout for ffprobe metadata validation used by stop/integrity checks. Metadata-only probe avoids full frame counting overhead.
_recording_overload_guard_enabled_commen: If true, runtime monitor marks recording degraded when sustained overload/unhealthy signals are detected.
_recording_overload_cpu_percent_threshol: CPU percent threshold used by overload guard samples.
_recording_overload_poll_interval_second: Seconds between overload guard runtime samples during active recording.
_recording_overload_unhealthy_streak_thr: Consecutive unhealthy/overload samples required before overload guard activates.
_recording_slo_min_effective_fps_comment: SLO threshold for effective per-camera FPS used by post-stop alert hooks.

crop._comment: Crop values are PIXELS TO REMOVE from each edge, NOT nvvidconv coordinates
crop._example: For 3840x2160 sensor: left=480 removes 480px from left, output width = 3840-480-480 = 2880

0._exposure_comment: Exposure compensation: -2.0 to +2.0, where 0 is neutral. Positive = brighter, negative = darker. Synchronized across cameras.
